metadata.title: CVE-2021-32265 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Bento4 through v1.6.0-637. Aglobal-buffer-overflow exists in the functionAP4_MemoryByteStream::WritePartial() located in Ap4ByteStream.cpp. Itallows an attacker to cause code execution or information disclosure.

criterions.comment: kodi-inputstream-adaptive package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
